remarks: Equality theorem for the directed integral.  (The domain of the equality here is very rough; for more precise bounds one should decompose it with ~ ditgpos first and use the equality theorems for ~ df-itg .) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Aug-2014.)
statement:
ditgeq3 $p |- ( A. x e. RR D = E -> S_ [ A -> B ] D _d x = S_ [ A -> B ] E _d x ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
